Not just a Pizza, An Experience

From our modest beginnings in 1964, Pizza Luigi has grown to become the most recognized pizzeria in Sicily.
We create food we are proud to serve and believe in giving back to our community.

Our most popular wood-fired pizza

Diavola

Pepperoni, ham, black olives, basil & oregano, bell peppers, mushroom and mozzarella
